metadata.title: CVE-2018-18646 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab Community and Enterprise Edition before11.2.7, 11.3.x before 11.3.8, and 11.4.x before 11.4.3. It allows SSRF.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
